ZNZRPG.carriedWeightHint: Total weight of all items the character is holding. For every {weightThreshold} weight, increase action cost by 1.
ZNZRPG.rollPenaltyHint: Reduce the dice face on all rolls by this value. As you become more tired and injured, this value begins to increase.
ZNZRPG.actionCostHint: Each action will consume this much Satiety and Energy. Reduce Carried Weight to decrease this value.
ZNZRPG.strHint: Number of dice rolled for melee attacks, blocking, and physical feats of strength
ZNZRPG.perHint: Number of dice rolled for scouting, looting, and general feats of observation
ZNZRPG.intHint: Number of dice rolled for most non-combat skill rolls and learning new skills
ZNZRPG.dexHint: Number of dice rolled for ranged attacks, dodging, and movement/acrobatic feats
ZNZRPG.endHint: Number of dice rolled when resisting damage, morale loss, environmental conditions, and adverse conditions
ZNZRPG.rizHint: Number of dice rolled when interacting with NPCs, party interactions, and buffing party members
ZNZRPG.meleeSkillHint: Add this to your dice face during melee combat
ZNZRPG.rangedSkillHint: Add this to your dice face during ranged combat
ZNZRPG.blockSkillHint: Add this to your dice face when blocking attacks. Block actions reduce total damage taken from an attack.
ZNZRPG.dodgeSkillHint: Add this to your dice face when dodging attacks. Dodge actions avoids an attack altogether, but only if you exceed the base roll.
ZNZRPG.stealthSkillHint: Add this to your dice face when performing stealth actions. Stealth reduces chance of detection when performing actions.
